edit_playlist.description: Update the playlist ID or URL for {playlist_name}.

manage_blockers.description: Add or edit conditions that stop Ambient Music.

remove_blockers.title: Remove blockers
remove_blockers.description: Choose one or more blockers to remove.

get_blueprints.title: Get the Automation Blueprints
get_blueprints.description:
Ambient Music requires some automations to function properly.

The full documentation for Ambient Music can be found at github.com/connochio/ambient_music_documentation.

If you are looking for ready-made and downloadable blueprints for these automations, they can also be found in the documentation at github.com/connochio/ambient_music_documentation.
